class Solution:
    def waysToReachStair(self, k: int) -> int:
        curr = 1
        jump = 1
        down = 1
        ans = 0
        while curr - down <= k:
            # print(curr, jump, down)
            if curr >= k >= curr - down:
                diff = k - (curr - down)
                ans += math.comb(down, diff)
            curr += jump
            jump <<= 1
            down += 1
        return ans
